items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 315-70r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
With similar, but improved specs to the factory tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 315-70r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 315/70R17 Tire Size
The 315/70R17 tire size is a little unique; it’s something you’ll find on mid-to-late 2000s Hummers and Ford F-150 Raptor models from 2010-2020 but not much else. Both of these vehicles are larger trucks that do some off-road driving, so it makes sense that they would’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of Goodyear Wrangler AT Extreme or [BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2](https://simpletire.com/brands/bfgoodrich-tires/all-terrain-t-a-ko2) tires attached.

Popular vehicles
2003-2009 Hummer H2
2010-2021 Ford F-150 Raptor

Larger trucks like the Ford F-150 Raptor and Hummer H2 are taken off-road from time to time, so they need a set of tires that are built to perform on any terrain. Take a look at the Toyo Open Country A/T III, [Hankook Dynapro AT2 Xtreme (RF12)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/dynapro-at2-xtreme-rf12), and Nexen Roadian AT Pro RA8 if you need a set of 315/70R17 all-terrain tires for your H2 or F-150 Raptor.

While all-terrain tires are good off-road, they might struggle with deep mud and difficult off-road terrains. That’s where mud terrain tires come in, and the Nitto Trail Grappler M/T, [Kumho Road Venture MT71](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/road-venture-mt71), and Mickey Thompson Baja Boss M/T off drivers great performance in the toughest off-road terrains.

Whether you drive a Hummer H2, Ford F-150 Raptor, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 315/70R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
